sentences.english: And the belshazzar also has a sauna.
The TSA says that the deployment is still in the pilot phase.
sentences.chinese: 塔尔萨机场表示设备仍在试运行阶段。

sentences.english: The BBC's correspondent in Seoul is John Sudworth.
sentences.chinese: BBC驻首尔记者约翰萨德沃思发来的报道。
一个萨那儿科医生这么告诉我。

sentences.english: A rich Sardarji needed blood for his heart surgery.
sentences.chinese: 富有的萨达尔需要血液来完成他的心脏手术。

sentences.english: King Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa of Bahrain tried pacifying his subjects with cash.
sentences.chinese: 巴林国王萨勒曼试图用金钱安抚他的臣民。

sentences.english: GIMSA dying assay observes morphology changes of apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆萨染色法观察细胞凋亡的形态学变化。

sentences.english: Before he surrendered, Mr. Saadat said he would die rather than give up.
sentences.chinese: 投降前，萨阿达特先生说，他宁死不降。

sentences.english: We had dinner at an outdoor fish restaurant called Sallam.
sentences.chinese: 我们在一家名为“萨兰姆”的户外鱼鲜餐馆用餐。

sentences.english: Mr Zapatero wisely said this week that he would stick to his guns.
sentences.chinese: 本周萨帕特罗明智地表示将坚持紧缩措施。

sentences.english: Soon Xanatos becomes Qui-Gon's first apprentice.
sentences.chinese: 很快，萨那托斯成了魁刚第一个徒弟。

sentences.english: You have salsa music on your answering machine.
sentences.chinese: 您有萨尔萨音乐在您的电话答录机。

sentences.english: Comrade Savitskaya was, simply, born to be a cosmonaut.
sentences.chinese: 萨维茨卡娅同志生来简直就是要成为宇航员。

sentences.english: Further on I watched Mas Carnaza.
sentences.chinese: 再论我看着马斯卡内萨。

sentences.english: Since what time has Juan Antonio Samaranch been the president of the International Olympic Committee?
sentences.chinese: 萨马蓝奇从什么时辰开始成为国际奥委会主席的？
